snippet: Saying the shootings were an “act of terror and an act of hate,” Mr. Obama again called for agreement on gun measures.
abstract: Pres Obama addresses nation after latest in series of mass shootings during his presidency; remarks echo previous mix of condolences with appeal to Americans to come together and stand against normalization of gun violence.
lead_paragraph: Saying the shootings were an “act of terror and an act of hate,” Mr. Obama again called for agreement on gun measures.

headline.main: After Nightclub Massacre, Obama Expresses Outrage and a Familiar Lament
headline.print_headline: After Another Hail of Bullets, Obama Offers a Familiar Lament
